mapper.sql: select product_id,product_name,product_price,stock_date,sale_quantity, product_info.type_id,color,picture,product_info.factoryAddress_Id, type_name,type_description,material,size,length,thickness,elasticity, factory_name from product_type join product_info on product_type.type_id = product_info.type_id left join factory_address on product_info.factoryAddress_Id = factory_address.factory_id
mapper.select: where product_name like concat('%',#{findCondition},'%') or color like concat('%',#{findCondition},'%')

select product_id,product_name,product_price,stock_date,sale_quantity, product_info.type_id,color,picture,product_info.factoryAddress_Id, type_name,type_description,material,size,length,thickness,elasticity, factory_name from product_type join product_info on product_type.type_id = product_info.type_id left join factory_address on product_info.factoryAddress_Id = factory_address.factory_id where product_id = #{productId}

select type_description,product_name,picture,product_price,product_id,product_info.factoryAddress_Id, product_info.type_id,factory_name from product_type join product_info on product_type.type_id = product_info.type_id left join factory_address on product_info.factoryAddress_Id = factory_address.factory_id
where product_info.factoryAddress_Id=#{factoryAddressId}

select type_description,picture,product_price,product_id,product_info.factoryAddress_Id, product_info.type_id,factory_name from product_type join product_info on product_type.type_id = product_info.type_id left join factory_address on product_info.factoryAddress_Id = factory_address.factory_id where product_info.type_id=#{goodsTypeId}
